name: WebContentSettings
desc: An object that configures which websites a user can access.

items.name: var blockedByFilter: WebContentSettings.FilterPolicy?
items.desc: The current policy for filtering websites.

items.name: static let blockedByFilter: SettingMetadata<WebContentSettings.FilterPolicy>
items.desc: A description of the setting that controls which websites a user can access.

items.name: enum FilterPolicy
items.desc: The policies available for filtering web content based on specific web domains.
